mapper.select: SELECT id, item_name AS itemName, cat_id AS catId, root_cat_id AS rootCatId, sell_counts AS sellCounts, on_off_status AS onOffStatus, content, created_time AS createdTime, updated_time AS updatedTime FROM items WHERE id = #{itemId}
SELECT id, item_id AS itemId, url, sort, is_main AS isMain, created_time AS createdTime, updated_time AS updatedTime FROM items_img WHERE item_id = #{itemId}

SELECT id, item_id AS itemId, name, stock, discounts, price_discount AS priceDiscount, price_normal AS priceNormal, created_time AS createdTime, updated_time AS updatedTime FROM items_spec WHERE item_id = #{itemId}

SELECT id, item_id AS itemId, produc_place AS producPlace, foot_period AS footPeriod, brand, factory_name AS factoryName, factory_address AS factoryAddress, packaging_method AS packagingMethod, weight, storage_method AS storageMethod, eat_method AS eatMethod, created_time AS createdTime, updated_time AS updatedTime FROM items_param WHERE item_id = #{itemId}

SELECT i.id as itemId, i.item_name as itemName, i.sell_counts as sellCounts, ii.url as imgUrl,/**/ tempSpec.price_discount as price FROM items i LEFT JOIN items_img ii ON i.id = ii.item_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT item_id,MIN(price_discount) as price_discount from items_spec GROUP BY item_id) tempSpec ON i.id = tempSpec.item_id WHERE ii.is_main = 1
AND i.item_name like '%${paramsMap.keyword}%'
ORDER BY
i.sell_counts desc
tempSpec.price_discount asc
i.item_name asc

SELECT i.id as itemId, i.item_name as itemName, i.sell_counts as sellCounts, ii.url as imgUrl, tempSpec.price_discount as price FROM items i LEFT JOIN items_img ii ON i.id = ii.item_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT item_id,MIN(price_discount) as price_discount from items_spec GROUP BY item_id) tempSpec ON i.id = tempSpec.item_id WHERE ii.is_main = 1 AND i.cat_id = #{paramsMap.catId} ORDER BY
i.sell_counts desc
tempSpec.price_discount asc
i.item_name asc
